metadata.synopsis: This VB plays when players near the body of Benryn's wife, Mirileth. Benryn has told them what she looks like - brown hair, green dress - and this body fits the description.

0.speaker: Player
0.text: Green blouse, brown hair - that must be Miri.
0.context: NodeContext: Names pronounced Ben-rin and MIH-ree

1.speaker: Player
1.context: NodeContext: Names pronounced Ben-rin and Mih-rih
